entry.source: {F812}Demonoid man\0{F813,1,415107}It's not as busy as when 430,000 people{F801}used to make use of the south entrance,{F801}but this place is starting to jump now.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demonoid man\0{F813,1,415107}It's not as busy as when 430,000 people{F801}used to make use of the south entrance,{F801}but this place is starting to jump now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demonoid woman\0{F813,1,419004}Shinjuku is ours now. I'm so happy I{F801}can't sleep! Truly, this is the city{F801}that doesn't sleep!{F801}
